snippet: To keep her children off the Lower East Side’s streets after school, Yoshita Childress keeps them busy with Catholic Big Sisters and Big Brothers.
abstract: Catholic Charities, supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides Yoshita Childress and her children with $425 to buy a computer for the family.
lead_paragraph: To keep her children off the Lower East Side’s streets after school, Yoshita Childress keeps them busy with Catholic Big Sisters and Big Brothers.

headline.seo: Bad Neighborhood, Good Children, Creative Mother
